Class_Quest_Name_Once, Twice, Three Time: Once, Twice, Three Times a Warrior
Class_Quest_Name_Pride and Duty (Will Ta: Pride and Duty (Will Take You from the Mountain)
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Berserk: Grants 3 stacks of Berserk, each stack guaranteeing weaponskill attacks are critical and direct hits.</br>Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Extends Surging Tempest duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s/</br>Additional Effect: Extends Surging Tempest duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodwhetting: Reduces damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Flow</br>Stem the Flow Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Tide</br>Stem the Tide Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency</br>Duration: 20s</br>Shares a recast timer with Nascent Flash.
Class_Skill_Desc_Chaotic Cyclone: Delivers a critical direct hit with a potency of 320 to all nearby enemies.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Infuriate by 5 seconds</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Nascent Chaos. Effect fades upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Decimate: Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 200.</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50</br>※Action changes to Chaotic Cyclone while under the effect of Nascent Chaos.
Class_Skill_Desc_Defiance: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Equilibrium: Restores own HP.</br>Cure Potency: 1,200</br>Additional Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Duration: 15s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Fell Cleave: Delivers an attack with a potency of 520.</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50</br>※Action changes to Inner Chaos while under the effect of Nascent Chaos.
Class_Skill_Desc_Heavy Swing: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Class_Skill_Desc_Holmgang: Brace yourself for an enemy onslaught, preventing most attacks from reducing your HP to less than 1.</br>Duration: 10s</br>When a target is selected, halts their movement with chains.
Class_Skill_Desc_Infuriate: Increases Beast Gauge by 50.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Nascent Chaos</br>Duration: 30s</br>//Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Inner Beast: Delivers an attack with a potency of 330.</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Inner Chaos: Delivers a critical direct hit with a potency of 660.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Infuriate by 5 seconds</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Nascent Chaos. Effect fades upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Inner Release: Grants 3 stacks of Inner Release, each stack allowing the use of Fell Cleave or Decimate without cost and guaranteeing they are critical and direct hits.</br>Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Inner Strength, nullifying Stun, Sleep, Bind, Heavy, and most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Extends Surging Tempest duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Primal Rend Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Interject: Interrupts the use of a target's action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Maim: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Combo Action: Heavy Swing</br>Combo Potency: 300</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 10////
Class_Skill_Desc_Mythril Tempest: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Overpower</br>Combo Potency: 150</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Surging Tempest, increasing damage dealt by 10%</br>Duration: 30s</br>Extends Surging Tempest duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 20//
Class_Skill_Desc_Nascent Flash: Grants Nascent Flash to self and Nascent Glint to target party member.</br>Nascent Flash Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Nascent Glint Effect: Restores HP equaling 100% of that recovered by Nascent Flash while also reducing damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Flow to target, reducing damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Stem the Tide to target, nullifying damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency</br>Duration: 20s</br>//Shares a recast timer with Bloodwhetting/Raw Intuition.
Class_Skill_Desc_Onslaught: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Orogeny: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.</br>Shares a recast timer with Upheaval.
Class_Skill_Desc_Overpower: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all nearby enemies.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Bloodwhetting: Grants Bloodwhetting, Stem the Tide, and Nascent Chaos.</br>Bloodwhetting Effect: Converts 100% of weaponskill damage dealt into HP</br>Duration: 10s</br>Stem the Tide Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage totaling 10% of your maximum HP</br>Duration: 10s</br>Nascent Chaos Effect: Bloodwhetting changes to Chaotic Cyclone</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blota: Instantly draws target to your side.</br>Additional Effect: Heavy +75%</br>Duration: 3s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Chaotic Cyclone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Inner Release Potency: 16,000</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Nascent Chaos.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fell Cleave: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Inner Release.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Heavy Swing: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Maim: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Heavy Swing</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Onslaught: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 500.</br>Potency increases up to 5,000 as HP nears maximum.</br>Consumes 10% of current HP when executed.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Orogeny: Delivers an attack with a potency of 1,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Potency increases up to 10,000 as HP nears maximum.</br>Consumes 10% of current HP when executed.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces target's damage dealt by 10%</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Primal Rend: Delivers a jumping physical attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 8,000.</br>Inner Release Potency: 16,000</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Primal Scream: Let out a bloodcurdling cry in a cone before you, rendering enemies unable to use Guard.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Inner Release and Thrill of Battle</br>Inner Release Effect: Increases the potency of Primal Rend and Chaotic Cyclone, while also increasing movement speed by 25%, and granting immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 15s</br>Cannot execute Guard while under the effect of Inner Release.</br>Thrill of Battle Effect: Increases maximum HP by 20% and restores the amount increased</br>Duration: 30s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 90s</br>※Storm's Path Combo changes to Fell Cleave while under the effect of Inner Release.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Storm's Path: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Maim</br>Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Primal Rend: Jumps to the target and delivers a critical direct hit to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 700 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate or direct hit rate.</br>Stacks of Inner Release are not consumed upon execution.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Primal Rend Ready, granted by Inner Release.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Provoke: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.
Class_Skill_Desc_Raw Intuition: Reduces damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Shares a recast timer with Nascent Flash.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reprisal: Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shake It Off: Creates a barrier around self and all nearby party members that absorbs damage totaling 15% of maximum HP.</br>Dispels Thrill of Battle, Vengeance, and Bloodwhetting/Raw Intuition, increasing damage absorbed by 2% for each effect removed. </br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Restores target's HP</br>Cure Potency: 300//
Class_Skill_Desc_Shield Wall: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 20%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shirk: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.
Class_Skill_Desc_Steel Cyclone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to all nearby enemies.</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Storm's Eye: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Combo Action: Maim</br>Combo Potency: 440</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Surging Tempest, increasing damage dealt by 10%</br>Duration: 30s</br>Extends Surging Tempest duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Storm's Path: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Combo Action: Maim</br>Combo Potency: 440</br>Combo Bonus: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Beast Gauge by 20//
Class_Skill_Desc_Stronghold: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 40%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Thrill of Battle: Increases maximum HP by 20% and restores the amount increased.</br>Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 20%</br>//Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Tomahawk: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.</br>Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Class_Skill_Desc_Upheaval: Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.</br>Shares a recast timer with Orogeny.
Class_Skill_Desc_Vengeance: Reduces damage taken by 30% and delivers an attack with a potency of 55 every time you suffer physical damage.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodwhetting: Weaponskills generate HP equal to the amount of damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Holmgang: Unable to move until effect fades.
Class_Status_Desc_Inner Release: All Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, knockback, and draw-in effects are nullified. Potency of Primal Rend and Chaotic Cyclone is also increased. Movement speed is also increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Nascent Flash: Absorbing HP with each physical attack delivered.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Equilibrium: Grants healing over time to self.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Infuriate: Reduces Infuriate recast time by 5 seconds upon landing Inner Beast, Steel Cyclone, Fell Cleave, or Decimate on most targets.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Nascent Flash: Extends the duration of Nascent Flash and Nascent Glint to 8 seconds.</br>Grants Stem the Flow to target, reducing damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 4s</br>Grants Stem the Tide to target, nullifying damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Onslaught: Allows a third charge of Onslaught.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shake It Off: Adds a healing effect to Shake It Off.</br>Cure Potency: 300
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Thrill of Batt: Adds an additional effect to Thrill of Battle that increases HP recovery via healing actions by 20%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Inner Beast Mastery: Upgrades Inner Beast to Fell Cleave.
Class_Trait_Desc_Mastering the Beast: Increases Beast Gauge when landing Mythril Tempest in a combo.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Heavy Swing to 200, Maim to 150, Storm's Path to 160, and Storm's Eye to 160.
Class_Trait_Desc_Nascent Chaos: Infuriate grants the effect of Nascent Chaos, upgrading Decimate to Chaotic Cyclone. Upon reaching level 80, Nascent Chaos will also upgrade Fell Cleave to Inner Chaos. </br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Tank Mastery: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.
Class_Trait_Desc_The Beast Within: Increases Beast Gauge when landing Maim or Storm's Path in a combo.
